idea-plugin.name: Base16 Tango
idea-plugin.vendor: @Schnouki, based on the Tango Desktop Project, Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Tango for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by @Schnouki, based on the Tango Desktop Project. Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
